attributes.comment:
I am writing to ask that you please reconsider the extreme increase in fees that
you have proposed. We are in the process of adopting a foreign child and thought
the fees to be high as they are. If you must increase the cost, an increase of 10-
15% would be much more acceptable and in line with other agency and business
increases. I don't think I have ever heard of an increase of this magnitude at one
time before in any type of business. We do not expect the government to pay for
our adoption nor do we think they should pay for other applications, but we do feel
you should be more reasonable in your increase.
John & Sandra Gavin

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Sandra Gavin
